content:
Let me try that again.

I'm interested in Vox and The Female Persuasion. Both books seem to explore the complexities of power dynamics and identity in a thought-provoking way. I've also been meaning to read more books by authors of color, so could you recommend some authors or books that explore similar themes? Additionally, I recently participated in an online book club discussion on Facebook about "The Power" by Naomi Alderman, and I was impressed by how the group analyzed the themes of power dynamics and feminism.
